Label: SC_SHORT_CODE
Comment:
"We use a granularity of 2 digits for 28XX and 5[4-6]XX short codes based on those we
have found online. Added support to individual short codes based on these docs:
http://www.avea.com.tr/web/media/Files/Bagisservisleri/bagisservisleri.pdf?noredir=1
and http://www.ttrehber.turktelekom.com.tr/trk-web/ozelservisnumaralari.html.
No official short code numbering plan found for Turkey to support complete ranges."

Label: SC_SMS_SERVICES
Comment: "All 28XX and 5XXX numbers found online are used for sms services. Ex: 2850, 2868, 5420,\n5560, 5664."

Label: SC_STANDARD_RATE
Comment: "As per Vodafone's article http://www.vodafone.com.tr/Net/vodafonenet-basvuru.php#sms,\n5420 is an SMS only service and its cost is based on the end user's carrier. However it\nis charged at standard rate as per above article."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "Includes numbers starting with 392 for Northern Cyprus. Not supporting additionally\nallocated area codes that are mentioned in ITU doc dated 7.VII.2009 as these are not\nmentioned in new ITU doc dated 2.III.2018."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "There are some differences between the Turkish and English wikipedia pages here, and\nsome number prefixes do not seem to be able to be found online. Omitting 500, 508 and\n509 from the English page because of this."

Label: XML_PAGER
Comment: "512 range is mentioned as call services number in eng.btk.gov.tr's doc. As we not sure\nof the category, supporting them as pager based on Wikipedia."

Label: XML_PERSONAL_NUMBER
Comment: "All 592 numbers are GMPCS numbers (personal satellite numbers) as per ITU doc. We do\nsupport only the ranges that are assigned (max 6 digit granularity) based on\neng.btk.gov.tr's doc."

Label: XML_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "Toll free range 800 of length 13 digits and 811 of length 10 digits are supported based\non user report."

Label: XML_VOIP
Comment: "Prefix 850 was earlier supported as UAN but after user report and other sources, found\nthat they belong to VOIP."
